city_name: San Casciano in Val di Pesa
welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Casciano in Val di Pesa
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Casciano in Val di Pesa, a charming city nestled in the heart of Tuscany. Get ready to immerse yourself in the rich culture, delicious food, and picturesque landscapes that make this city so special. Enjoy your stay and explore all that San Casciano has to offer!"

avg_prices.city: san casciano in val di pesa

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peretola Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Peretola Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for the first 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Siena Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
